question: The Government has amended which rules to bring insurance brokers within its ambit?
explanation:
The government has recently notified comprehensive amendments to the Insurance Ombudsman Rules, 2017.
As per the amendments, the insurance brokers are brought within the ambit of the Government. It also allowed policyholders to file online complaints. The scope of complaints also include deficiencies in service by insurers, agents, brokers and other intermediaries.
